mapper.insert: INSERT INTO solutions(id, category_id, title, difficulty, version, description, notes, status, created_at, created_by, updated_at, reviewed_by) VALUES (#{id}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{difficulty}, #{version}, #{description}, #{notes}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedAt}, #{reviewedBy})
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, c.name AS category_name, c.icon, c.color, creator.id as created_by_id, creator.username as created_username, reviewer.id as reviewed_by_id, reviewer.username as reviewed_username FROM solutions s JOIN categories c ON s.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN users creator ON s.created_by = creator.id LEFT JOIN users reviewer ON s.reviewed_by = reviewer.id WHERE s.id = #{solutionId}

SELECT s.*, c.name AS category_name, c.icon, c.color, creator.id as created_by_id, creator.username as created_username, reviewer.id as reviewed_by_id, reviewer.username as reviewed_username FROM solutions s JOIN categories c ON s.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN users creator ON s.created_by = creator.id LEFT JOIN users reviewer ON s.reviewed_by = reviewer.id WHERE s.status = #{status} ORDER BY s.updated_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM solutions WHERE status = #{status}

SELECT s.id, s.category_id, s.title, s.difficulty, s.version, s.description, s.notes, s.status, s.created_at, s.updated_at, s.reviewed_by, c.name AS category_name, c.icon, c.color, creator.id as created_by_id, creator.username as created_username, reviewer.id as reviewed_by_id, reviewer.username as reviewed_username FROM solutions s JOIN categories c ON s.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN users creator ON s.created_by = creator.id LEFT JOIN users reviewer ON s.reviewed_by = reviewer.id WHERE s.status = '已发布' ORDER BY s.updated_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM solutions WHERE status = '已发布'

SELECT s.*, c.name AS category_name, c.icon, c.color, creator.id as created_by_id, creator.username as created_username, reviewer.id as reviewed_by_id, reviewer.username as reviewed_username FROM solutions s JOIN categories c ON s.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN users creator ON s.created_by = creator.id LEFT JOIN users reviewer ON s.reviewed_by = reviewer.id WHERE s.id = #{solutionId} AND s.status = '已发布'
